com.feathersui.maven.plugin.lime_openfl

Class GenerateProjectXmlMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • com.feathersui.maven.plugin.lime_openfl.GenerateProjectXmlMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo

    @Mojo(name="generate-project-xml",
      defaultPhase=GENERATE_RESOURCES)
public class GenerateProjectXmlMojo
extends org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
    Generates a project.xml file for a Lime, OpenFL, or Feathers UI project. Intended for developers who prefer to have all of their build configuration in the Maven pom.xml file, and would rather not maintain two separate files.

    Hint: If you already have a Lime project.xml file, you don't need to generate one. You can simply keep your existing file. If your project.xml file is the same directory as pom.xml, it will be detected automatically, and you don't need to configure anything to use it. However, if project.xml is in a different directory from pom.xml, you can specify the BuildMojo.projectFile parameter to tell the plugin where it is located.

    The following example demonstrates how to add the generate-project-xml goal to your Maven pom.xml file. 

     
 <build>
   <plugins>
     <plugin>
       <groupId>com.feathersui.maven.plugins</groupId>
       <artifactId>lime-openfl-maven-plugin</artifactId>
       <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
       <executions>
         <execution>
           <goals>
             <!-- add this goal to generate project.xml before building -->
             <goal>generate-project-xml</goal>
             <goal>build</goal>
           </goals>
         </execution>
       </executions>
     </plugin>
   </plugins>
 </build>

    The project configuration may be specified using the limeProject parameter. See LimeProject for complete details. 

     
 <build>
   <plugins>
     <plugin>
       <groupId>com.feathersui.maven.plugins</groupId>
       <artifactId>lime-openfl-maven-plugin</artifactId>
       <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
       <configuration>
         <limeProject>
           <!-- configure project here -->
         </limeProject>
       </configuration>
       <executions>
         <execution>
           <goals>
             <goal>generate-project-xml</goal>
             <goal>build</goal>
           </goals>
         </execution>
       </executions>
     </plugin>
   </plugins>
 </build>
    See Also:
    LimeProject

    • Field Detail

      • limeProject

        @Parameter
public LimeProject limeProject
        Allows you to configure the project inside your Maven pom.xml file. See LimeProject for complete details.

        The following example demonstrates where the <limeProject> parameter should be added: 

         
 <build>
   <plugins>
     <plugin>
       <groupId>com.feathersui.maven.plugins</groupId>
       <artifactId>lime-openfl-maven-plugin</artifactId>
       <version>1.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
       <configuration>
         <limeProject>
           <!-- configure project here -->
         </limeProject>
       </configuration>
       <executions>
         <execution>
           <goals>
             <goal>generate-project-xml</goal>
             <goal>build</goal>
           </goals>
         </execution>
       </executions>
     </plugin>
   </plugins>
 </build>
